subject: Re: MSRA and KGTMS websites - new user

full_threads.body:
Hi Jason, 

Sure, I have now reset the MSRA site to: NQph&X8Gy$rmw5!Xk7YuuP#%

Hi Heath,

Sorry, but you reset the wrong password. You reset KGTMS and. Not the MSRA site.can you please reset the MSRA site please?

Thanks in advance,
Jason

Kind regards



Jason Cahill

Database Manager

Hi Jason, 

Sure, we reset the password for you from our end. It's: Yh3eAbNlr$OCYTxgSfEnaani

Hi Heath,

I got into the KGTMS website, but not the MSRA website. When I went to reset my password (I didn't get a link to set my password initially, just a link to the login page without a password) but the email I received after resetting my password had no link at all, see attached.

Can you please reset and tell me what my password is, or fix the email so I can reset the password myself?

Thanks,

Jason

Kind regards



Jason Cahill
